content.p: A member of the Teachers’ Retirement System who is in an active contributing status with the system, and who was formerly employed by a Federal Head Start agency, operated under 42 et seq., which does not participate in a state-administered retirement system, may obtain credit for the period of the member’s service in the Head Start program by purchasing this service credit under the same conditions that out-of-state service credit may be purchased under . The service credit purchased may not be used for meeting the service requirements set forth in , subsection (2) of Section 9 of this Act, or 1). Payment for the service credit purchased may be made in installments in lieu of a lump-sum payment. The payment shall not be picked up, as described in , and the entire payment shall be placed in the teachers’ savings fund.
